content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for showing interest in renting my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay in Mannheim, and I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you to ensure that we both benefit from this arrangement. Based on the size of the apartment and its location, I believe that we can agree on a fair and reasonable rental price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I dont want to continue the negotiation. I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. TERMINATE.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. Based on the information you have provided, I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month for the apartment. Thank you for your interest in renting my property, and I wish you a pleasant stay in Mannheim. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to continue the negotiation. I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

I would like to know if there are any additional costs or fees that I should be aware of.

Also, I am interested in the terms of the lease agreement.

Can you provide me with a copy of the lease agreement?

Thank you!

TERMINATE.

name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I understand that you would like to continue the negotiation and clarify some additional details regarding the rental agreement. Based on our discussion, I agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month for the apartment. In terms of additional costs or fees, there may be some utilities and maintenance expenses that you will be responsible for, but I will provide you with a detailed breakdown of these costs in the lease agreement.

Regarding the lease agreement, I can provide you with a copy of it once we have finalized the rental price and other terms. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns, and I will be happy to assist you. TERMINATE.
